description: Try our easy to follow One-Pot Ham & Mushroom Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: One-Pot Ham & Mushroom Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir through three-quarters of parmesan and spinach and stand for 5 minutes to thicken slightly. Top with remaining parmesan and chives, season with black pepper and serve.
